Instructions.Text:
Welcome to the introduction for the Tinder-Analog Segregation (TAS) Task.

Each trial will appear on a card.  When it appears, it will be accompanied by an auditory stimulus.

Each block will begin with a Blue-colored Standard stimulus that should be swiped to the Left (towards the Blue border).  It will be followed by a Green-colored Target stimulus, that should be swiped to the Right (towards the Green border).

The first two special stimuli of each block will be followed by 10 Silver-Colored stimuli. Swipe them Left if they match the Standard, swipe them Right if they match the Target.

After every 10 trials, the collective results will be submitted to the algorithm as a single  CorrectResponse if there were 8+ correct TAS responses (it's a parameter).  Thus, the algorithm was configured to just be a 1/1 staircase.

In Summary:

Swipe stimuli matching the Standard to the Left.
Swipe stimuli matching the Target to the Right.

You can replay an example Standard, an example Target, and the current stimulus at-will.
